titleStmt.title: The excellency of holy courage in evil times by Jeremiah Burroughs ; published by Thomas Goodwin ... [et al.]
titleStmt.author: Burroughs, Jeremiah, 1599-1646.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Peter Cole and Edward Cole,

notesStmt.note: "In which (besides many other seasonable truths) there is shewed, 1. that wicked men in power are very fierce in their wrath ... "
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
